name: Can You Keep a Secret? A Code Lyoko RPG
name_original: Can You Keep a Secret? A Code Lyoko RPG
description:
Hello, friends. Can you keep a secret?

You find yourself in a locked house as Jeremie Belpois, the brains of the team, but with the press of a button, you can bring up a menu and change perspective to another member. What keeps this group together, you may ask? Going to a virtual world to fight a malicious AI which attacks Earth. But they have to actually...get...to the supercomputer first.

This game has a focus on flavor text and secrets, there's also puzzles and combat.

It was created with fans of the show Code Lyoko in mind, but it isn't necessary to know the show to enjoy this game.

Currently, I have a playable demo which consists of the first section, escaping from the abandoned house with a very personal connection to one of the gang.
